00014 namespace BulletHell.Game.Object
00015 {
00016     public class MoveableSpriteObj : MoveableObj
00017     {
00018         protected int xImages, // how many images in x direction in the sprite src file
00019             yImages, // how many images in y direction in the sprite src file
00020             xCounter, // current x image of the sprite
00021             yCounter; // current y image of the sprite
00022         protected TimeSpan elapsedTime;
00023 
00024         public double MoveRate { get; private set; } // how fast does the sprite changes per second
00025         internal MoveableSpriteObj(Texture2D sprite, int x, int y, int vx, int vy, int srcRectWidth, int srcRectHeight, double moveRate)
00026             : base(sprite, x, y, vx, vy, srcRectWidth, srcRectHeight)
00027         {
00028             xImages = sprite.Width / srcRectWidth;
00029             yImages = sprite.Height / srcRectHeight;
00030             xCounter = 0;
00031             yCounter = 0;
00032             elapsedTime = TimeSpan.Zero;
00033             MoveRate = moveRate;
00034         }
00035 
00036         // IMovable
00037         public void move(float x, float y, Vector2 speed)
00038         {
00039             base.move(x, y, speed.X, speed.Y);
00040 
00041             if (x > 0) // Right
00042                 yCounter = 2;
00043             else if (x < 0) // Left
00044                 yCounter = 1;
00045 
00046             if (y > 0) // Down
00047                 yCounter = 0;
00048             else if (y < 0) // Up
00049                 yCounter = 3;
00050 
00051             // rect updated for collision detections
00052             srcRect.X = xCounter * Width;
00053             srcRect.Y = yCounter * Height;
00054         }
00055 
00056         internal override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00057         {
00058             elapsedTime += gameTime.ElapsedGameTime;
00059             if (elapsedTime > TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(1000 / MoveRate))
00060             {
00061                 elapsedTime -= TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(1000 / MoveRate);
00062                 xCounter++; // moves the sprite
00063                 if (xCounter == xImages)
00064                     xCounter = 0;
00065             }
00066             base.Update(gameTime);
00067         }
00068 
00069         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime) {
00070             base.Draw(gameTime);
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }
